attributes.action: make fuel the price it should be sold at and not with a 77% tax on it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The goverment take a 77% tax on petrol which is absurd and we as a nation need to do something about so please sign this petition and solve the problem once and for all.
If you are one of those people who thinks it wont help they wont lower it whatever we do, well you have nothing to loose so just sign it and lets see if it does work.
Thanks Matt
